1: A Song of Ascents; of David. Behold, how good and how pleasant it is for brethren to dwell together in unity!
2: It is like the precious oil upon the head, that ran down upon the beard, even Aaronâ€™s beard; that came down upon the skirt of his garments;
3: Like the dew of Hermon, that cometh down upon the mountains of Zion: for there the LORD commanded the blessing, even life for evermore.
